resources.string: If you like the app, consider supporting development.
By installing or using this application, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of the terms, please do not use the app.

The application is a simple character power counter designed for the board game Munchkin. It helps players calculate and track character strength during gameplay. The app works fully offline and does not require network access.
The application does not collect, store, process, or share any personal information. No user accounts, analytics, tracking, or identifiers are used.
The application operates entirely on your device. It does not connect to the internet, external servers, or third-party services.
The application contains no advertisements and does not display promotional content of any kind.
The application is intended for entertainment purposes only and is designed to be used as an auxiliary tool while playing Munchkin. It does not replace official game rules or materials.

All rights to the application, including its design, code, and interface, belong to the developer. The Munchkin name and related content are the property of their respective owners and are not affiliated with or endorsed by this application.
The application is provided ‚Äúas is‚Äù, without warranties of any kind. The developer does not guarantee that the app will be error-free or uninterrupted.
The developer is not responsible for any damages, losses, or issues arising from the use or inability to use the application.
These Terms of Use may be updated in the future. Continued use of the application after changes are made constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
If you have questions or feedback regarding these Terms of Use, you may contact the developer through the platform where the application is distributed.
By using Counter 123, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use.

This app is a simple and lightweight power counter.

The Counter 123 app is your reliable solution for all your counting needs. Whether you\'re tracking your daily water intake, monitoring your exercise repetitions, or calculating your expenses, this versatile program has you covered. Its intuitive interface and powerful management features make it easy.
We do not collect personal data.
